name: Creature Jungle: Project Shadowsteal
description:
This is a short fan game shmup called Creature Jungle http://web.archive.org/web/20050312024434/http://www1.odn.ne.jp/ceb94660/softwar...

All assets are from that game and some photos from photo mode of No Man's Sky.

BGM are original works created by Katrah-Quey.

Made using Shooting Game Builder.
